**** Google Protocol Buffer

**** Video/Audio

     Will use telepath.


* In Gentoo

#+BEGIN_SRC sh
emerge protobuf zeromq czmq
#+END_SRC


* In Arch Linux

ZeroMQ can be installed using pacman.

As to protobuf, build it using abs.
